name: Shokupan
instructions:
Yudane: Mix 60g flour with 60g boiling water in a stand mixer. Once cool, tear into 1-inch pieces.
Dough: Add milk to Yudane and combine. Add flour and yeast then knead for 1-2 minutes. Let rest 15 minutes.
Add sugar and salt and knead 10 minutes, scraping bowl halfway through. Add butter and continue kneading 5-10 minutes longer. Shape into ball and let rise 1 hour.
Divide into 2 portions, shape, and let rest for 15 minutes.
Roll into 7-inch square, book fold, then roll. Place into a bread pan. Cover and let rise 1+ hours.
Bake at 350 for 30-35 minutes. Let cool 3 hours.
